lead_paragraph: Promotion-chasing Derby County sacked highly-rated head coach Paul Clement on Monday and appointed academy director and former Rams defender Darren Wassall in his place at the second tier English side.

headline.print_headline: Derby Sack Clement After Eight Months in Charge
headline.main: Derby Sack Clement After Eight Months in Charge

snippet: Promotion-chasing Derby County sacked highly-rated head coach Paul Clement on Monday and appointed academy director and former Rams defender Darren Wassall in his place at the second tier English side....
